query.value:
select trim(regexp_replace( 사업장명, '[#|&|"|''|�]', '', 'g')) as query from cd_ods.tb_cic_restaurant_info_t where 영업상태명 ='영업/정상' and 업태구분명 not in ('편의점','패스트푸드','아이스크림','백화점','고속도로','떡카페','키즈카페','과자점','철도역구내','유원지','극장','관광호텔','공항') and trim(regexp_replace( 사업장명, '[#|&|"|''|�]', '', 'g')) not in (select trim(regexp_replace(title, '[
|
]','','g')) from cd_ods.tb_cic_naver_result_t ) and trim(regexp_replace( 사업장명, '[#|&|"|''|�]', '', 'g')) not in (select query from cd_ods.tb_cic_naver_result_t ) and trim(regexp_replace( 사업장명, '[#|&|"|''|�]', '', 'g')) not in (select title from cd_ods.tb_cic_processed_name_t ) order by 사업장명 limit 5000 ;

activities.name: Lookup API Info
activities.description: API 정보를 가져오기 위해 LOOKUP 파일에test

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('  SELECT CMONTH2 FROM CD_ODS.APS_SDC_PW_MST WHERE CMONTH2 BETWEEN ''202210'' AND ''202211'' GROUP BY CMONTH2 ORDER BY CMONTH2;' )

activities.name: API REQ INFO
activities.description: API INDEX 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서INDEX 번호를 읽어옵니다.

activities.name: ORA GET CNT
activities.description: 저장된 값의 Total 값을 확인하기 위해 DB조

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT NVL(max(qty), 0) as total_cnt FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = ''', pipeline().parameters.ServiceId, ''' ORDER BY row_id DESC ')

text.value:
INSERT INTO cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq (type, row_id, qty, crt_dt, crt_user) 
VALUES (
  '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}'
  , (SELECT NVL(MAX(row_id), 0) + 1 FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}')
  , '@{variables('endIdx')}'
  , to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhhmiss')
, 'system'
);
